name: Serendipity Caffe
body:
## Serendipity Caffe
in Warrenton, Oregon

**For years, Serendipity Caffe has been serving delicious cuisine to the Warrenton, OR community in a comfortable, inviting atmosphere.** Our restaurant offers breakfast and lunch along with savory desserts. We also have catering services available for your next special occasion.

Stop in and have our friendly waiting staff serve you a fantastic meal that’s perfect for the whole family.

**Learn More About Serendipity Caffe:**

* Menu – Breakfast, lunch, desserts, takeout, espresso drive thru, and more
* Catering – Birthdays, corporate catering, office functions, anniversaries, and more

Please call to see if we are able to cater for your event!

Contact Serendipity Caffe **today at 503-861-0222**, or browse the website for more information about our products and services.
